name: Dayman
description:
I made this with a couple of guys from uni (Ewan and Chris) a few years ago. It's terrible and it's meant to be. I'm not sure why you would want to play it but I have uploaded the source files if you feel like it.

I worked on the scrolling background and "pop-ups" among other things. I can't remember exactly it was a long time ago.

Controls:
Just press space
